name: MENET AERO
sampleDescriptions: Aerospace and unmanned aerial vehicle capabilities for Department of Defense and US Military use, covering issues addressed in National Defense Authorization Acts and Defense Appropriations Bills. Add

Aerospace and unmanned aerial vehicle capabilities for Department of Defense and US Military use, covering issues addressed in National Defense Authorization Acts and Defense Appropriations Bills. Add
Programmatic and funding issues related to unmanned aerial systems and Department of Defense requirements in the FY24 House Appropriations Bill and Senate Appropriations bill.
Language provisions and propose regulations changes governing the use of unmanned aerial systems in the Federal Aviation Administration Reauthorization Bill.
